column4: Files extracted from the PC version of KH 1.5 + 2.5, credit for Track Descriptions goes to Sonicshadowsilver2 from the KH2 Rando discord. As a remake, filenames may not reflect intent for GBA original

column3: Battle before Field is an interesting inconsistency but may just be alphabetical
穏やか (おだやか), Calm. Same designation as Peaceful Hearts from BBS
Interesting that this is labelled for general Org XIII use and not something more specific, like a traitor theme
Why is this in the middle of Wonderland? Also, specifically labelled as Event theme, which disagrees with Green Reqiuem's analysis
More related tracks split up with other stuff in-between
An overly literal TL of Castle Oblivion's JP name, 忘却の城 , could be "Forget Castle"
Track associated directly with Riku, not just Ansem, which lines up with Green Reqiuem's analysis
The funniest case of split up tracks
Boss theme for non-Heartless, i.e. Disney characters, i.e. characters from the World in question
緊迫 (きんぱく), tension, same as Shaded Truths in BBS
Underscore implies a missing description in the filename
Where's Event 3? More inconsistent file naming
